UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Pituitary adenylate cyclase-activating polypeptide is a potent broad-spectrum antimicrobial peptide: Structure-activity relationships.
Literature.Author: Starr CG, Maderdrut JL, He J, Coy DH, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MSC=7.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MSC=1.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MSC=>30µM),Bacillus cereus(MSC=13.3µM)
